oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Chevrolet, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo of the used car business of Capitol Chevrolet, from the Nashville Times (1940). The automobile dealership is cited in the 1941 City Directory with “C. N. Rolfe, Jr. Pres; W. H. Gourley, V-Pres.; Minos Cox, Sec-Treas, Chevrolet Sales and Service, 510 Broadway.” And also: “Chevrolet Inc. used car br 912 Broadway.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Capitol Chevrolet (Nashville, Tenn.)
